long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
It is convenient for users to batch generate random passwords and copy and save them to their own documents.
You can select the characters to include:
1 Capital letters A-Z
2 Small letters a-z
3 digits 0-9
4 special characters! @ # $%^&* "

Installation and use
Chrome store search Generate random password plug-in can be used after installation. It is free and does not require any user permission
